title: Emoji Search App
description: Emoji Search is a lightweight React web app to instantly search and explore emojis by keyword or symbol.Seamlessly browse and copy your favorites for use in chat, social media, or design projects.

title: Cryptocurrency Tracker
description: This application fetches a live list of cryptocurrencies from the Cryptowatch API and displays their real-time prices. It also includes an instant search feature, allowing users to quickly find and monitor any cryptocurrency on demand.
